item.title: Grouping of reproductive organs
item.description: External reproductive organs Males penis scrotum Females vaginal opening labia clitoris Internal reproductive organs Males 2 testicles 2 epididymis 2 vas deferenses 2 seminal vesicles prostate gland Females 2 ovaries 2 fallopian tubes / uterine tubes [[uterus]] vagina

item.title: Human nervous system
item.description: Functions sensory input information processing motor output [[neurons]] are its basic unit center for all mental activity _thought, learning, memory

item.title: Human reproductive system
item.description: [!important] Aim to pass on characteristics with genes Differences between male-female Primary sexual characteristics reproductive organs Secondary sexual characteristics (result of sex hormones)
